body_html:
Hello,

Has there been any progress on getting fused_batch_norm working on 3D data?

Up until now I was using tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm, but due to tf.nn.moments returning negative values for variance (as reported here), I am forced to switch to fused_batch_norm. I suspect many people dealing with 3D data will be running into similar problems.

Thanks.
body_text:
Hello,
Has there been any progress on getting fused_batch_norm working on 3D data?
Up until now I was using tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm, but due to tf.nn.moments returning negative values for variance (as reported here),  I am forced to switch to fused_batch_norm.  I suspect many people dealing with 3D data will be running into similar problems.
Thanks.
body:
Hello,


Has there been any progress on getting fused_batch_norm working on 3D data?

Up until now I was using tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm, but due to tf.nn.moments returning negative values for variance (as reported [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/3290)),  I am forced to switch to fused_batch_norm.  I suspect many people dealing with 3D data will be running into similar problems.

Thanks.
